name: PM Kisan Yojana
description: Provides income support to small and marginal farmers. Available for both BPL and APL farmers within income limits.

name: PM Ujjwala Yojana
description: Provides free LPG gas connections to women from BPL households.

name: National Scholarship Portal (CSSS)
description: Scholarship for students pursuing higher education from economically weaker families.

name: PM Mudra Loan Scheme
description: Loans up to ₹10 lakh for small business owners, self-employed individuals, and entrepreneurs (APL and BPL both).

name: Stand-Up India Scheme
description: Provides financial support for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs to start new businesses.

name: National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS)
description: One-time financial assistance for BPL families on the death of the primary breadwinner.

name: PM KUSUM (Solar Pump Scheme)
description: Subsidy for farmers to install solar pumps — applicable to both BPL and APL farmers.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
description: Monthly pension to BPL citizens aged 60 years and above.
